授業方法: This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will practice verbal communication skills suitable for future business needs. Textbook and written work will provide input and language basis regarding business English as it is used in workplaces. Materials will also be provided for working on short presentation skills suitable for business contexts. Class time will be devoted to pairwork and discussions, along with presentations. Homework and written preparation for discussions and presentations outside of class will be essential. Work with video to record video CVs and practice interview skills will also be done. Classes are currently planned to be taught face-to-face in the classroom; adaptations may be made based on changing conditions and university policies.
